last_episode_to_air.name: Bill Goes Stir Crazy
last_episode_to_air.overview: A truck slams into the roof of a viaduct and almost falls over, Tryke saves a forklift, a tractor trailer gets bent out of shape, and Marci causes Bill to go over the edge after she leaves town.

name: Wrecked
overview: The Gratzianna family and their team of fearless tow truck drivers navigates a mix of out-of-control customers, stranded motorists and massive highway accidents and recoveries. They put their lives at risk day in and day out to keep the streets of Chicago and their passengers safe.

episodes.name: I Just Need a Good Wreck
episodes.overview: O'Hare Towing's Bill Gratzianna and his team of drivers use their expertise and elbow grease to keep Chicago highways clear. In the series premiere, a 25-ton garbage truck is taken out by a pothole, an SUV crashes into a tractor trailer, a massive excavator gets dumped into the street, and a drunk driver hurtles into a ditch.

episodes.name: Dominating the Market
episodes.overview: A tandem trailer bottoms out trying to avoid a crash, a tractor trailer wedges itself into a tunnel, a semi carrying 42 tons of cargo teeters on a mound of ice, and O'Hare's owners butt heads about the cost of new construction.

episodes.name: Old Dogs, New Tricks
episodes.overview: A driver wraps a car around a pole, a semi full of paper gets stuck in the mud on some railroad tracks, an overloaded dump truck takes a spill, and Bill's daughters show him who's boss.

episodes.name: Accidents Happen
episodes.overview: Joey and Tony must rescue a massive crane from a ravine, a three-car smash-up leaves Jorge and Jeff with their hands full and the crew has to clean up a 30,000 pound truck spill in the middle of the night before morning rush hour. But when the guys mess up and break one of O'Hare's best wreckers, an angry Bill lets them have it!

episodes.name: White Means Green
episodes.overview: A blizzard pushes the O'Hare guys over the edge as the recoveries get even riskier. Jameson is challenged by a car that crashes over an interstate guardrail, Dwight is ready to quit after a non-stop slew of wrecks, and the team works into the night on an out-of-control minivan as passing cars put their lives in peril.

episodes.name: Fire and Ice
episodes.overview: The temperature in Chicago may be below freezing, but the wrecks and Bill's temper are heating up! A flatbed carrying tons of cargo ices over, a tractor trailer burns to a char and a semi flies off the road. The new female safety manager Angela butts heads with the O'Hare guys after their dangerous encounters.

episodes.name: Under the Wire
episodes.overview: A cement truck falls on its side; a tractor-trailer is wedged under an overpass; a dump truck breaks an axle.

episodes.name: On Top of the Game
episodes.overview: A car goes through the front of a house; a semi gets stuck in the mud; an axle needs fixing on a tractor-trailer; a visit to a tow show in Florida.

episodes.name: Off-Roading in Chicago
episodes.overview: A garbage truck flips over on an exit ramp, one operator has to deal with three accidents in one hour, a pickup truck gets stuck on railroad tracks, and a driver must redeem himself after wrecking his service truck.

episodes.name: Keep On Trucking
episodes.overview: A tractor trailer falls to pieces after making a hard turn, a truck gets stuck in the mud, Bill has fun crushing cars, and a pair of semis are bogged down in the mud.

episodes.name: False Alarms
episodes.overview: Joey finds a boat foundering on Lake Michigan after getting beaten to a big wreck.

episodes.name: Two Brothers, One Showdown
episodes.overview: A semi takes out a guardrail; a Bobcat flips into a ditch; a motor home is smashed to bits; Bill and Joey have a weight-loss contest.

episodes.name: Bill Goes Stir Crazy
episodes.overview: A truck slams into the roof of a viaduct and almost falls over, Tryke saves a forklift, a tractor trailer gets bent out of shape, and Marci causes Bill to go over the edge after she leaves town.

episodes.name: Pain In The Glass
episodes.overview: After Bill's arm is cut by a shard of glass, he goes right back into the field to clean up a wrecked glass truck.

episodes.name: School's In Session
episodes.overview: Joey frees a stranded semi, then returns to the shop to help Bill teach a course on operating a heavy duty tow truck.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: A trailer is wedged under a railroad bridge; one of the operators discusses the deaths of his parents.

episodes.name: And The Winner Is?
episodes.overview: The O'Hare team get ready for the annual Illinois  Tow Show, where drivers compete for the title of best wrecker in the state.

episodes.name: The Big Move
episodes.overview: O'Hare Towing moves to a new location, but a problem with the phone system threatens to shut them down.

episodes.name: All Nighter
episodes.overview: The O'Hare crew battles the rain and darkness to complete the hardest recovery of the year.

episodes.name: Wall Of The Fallen
episodes.overview: .Bill and Marci pay they respects to the tow truck operators who have sacrificed their lives are commemorated at a ceremony.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: A fuel tanker gets stuck on an interstate ramp and a semi skids off the highway landing sideways into a ditch, delaying the crew's Thanksgiving dinner.

episodes.name: Hogs
episodes.overview: A livestock truck carrying 150 hogs collides head on with a pick up truck.

episodes.name: Joe, Terminal Manager
episodes.overview: A tractor trailer loses control and rolls over an on-ramp, and an overseas container slides down a slick road and rolls over at an intersection.

episodes.name: The Ice Storm Cometh
episodes.overview: Two tractor trailers collide head on; a vehicle slides straight into a ditch and a Honda sedan slides off the road into a neighbor's yard.

episodes.name: Slaying The Dragon
episodes.overview: A container truck full of cardboard tips over on the highway; Tony and Jay break Tryke's truck and a semi gets stuck in a loading dock.

episodes.name: Marci's The Boss
episodes.overview: A tractor trailer loses control and rolls over an on-ramp; an overseas container slides down a slick road and rolls over at an intersection and Bill leaves town leaving Marci to man the shop.

episodes.name: The Blizzard
episodes.overview: A 40 ton rig slides over into a ditch, an SUV rolls off the highway and Jay, Keith, Don and TJ winch out victims of the storm.

episodes.name: Coldest Day Of The Year
episodes.overview: Dispatch gets into a frenzy as slick roads cause a five car pile-up and a jackknifed tractor trailer blocks an off ramp, while all the drivers are out on calls for dead vehicles.

episodes.name: Odd Jobs
episodes.overview: It's not a typical day of rescues for the crew at O'Hare when a pedestrian bridge gets stuck over an icy pond and a 4500 lb. helicopter must be transported to a nearby facility.

episodes.name: It's A Dangerous Job
episodes.overview: A truck breaks down on a bridge, a fuel tanker starts to smoke and leak in mid-transport, a semi plows over an electrical light post, a semi crashes into a wall on the highway and a 200,000 pound crane breaks down on a city street.

episodes.name: Code Red
episodes.overview: A semi is stuck under a bridge after a wheel breaks, a box truck has a head on collision and three burned cars are towed.

episodes.name: Snow Angels
episodes.overview: A two-car collision leaves one buried in the snow; two trucks are stuck on an icy slope and a pickup plunges into a river.

episodes.name: Stuck In The Mud
episodes.overview: A roof cave in leaves a car trapped inside a garage; an expensive sports car is carefully transported and several cars are winched out of muddy driveways.

episodes.name: The Windy City
episodes.overview: An overseas container is blown over the side of a highway, a 40-ton crane sinks into a deep muddy sinkhole, and a 5-ton semi is stuck in the soft thawing ground.

episodes.name: Rookies
episodes.overview: Every year, O'Hare breaks in a class of rookie drivers. They're put to the test right away, as Bill leads them to a roll over in a freight yard, and later they square off in a towing skills competition.

episodes.name: Jane Runs The Show
episodes.overview: Bill and Marci head out of town, living Bill's sister Jane in charge of O'Hare. The calls roll in, including a cargo van that has fallen off a lift, and a tricky winch out.

episodes.name: Friday The 13
episodes.overview: It's Friday the 13, and O'Hare is haunted by freak occurrences. Two calls come in simultaneously, and Marci's birthday celebration is interrupted by a shocking disturbance.

episodes.name: First Day Of Spring
episodes.overview: Spring finally comes to Chicago, and the warm weather means muddy terrain. Bill and the Boys take on a machine load shift, while Tryke tackles a dump truck.

episodes.name: The Biggest And The Baddest
episodes.overview: The Gratziannas discuss the worst wrecks of the past season.

episodes.name: Death Defying And Deadly
episodes.overview: The season finale counts down the most treacherous, danger packed recoveries that O'Hare has faced.
